name: Peppermill Resort Spa Casino
description: Experience the eco-conscious Peppermill Resort Spa Casino, Reno's Premier AAA Four Diamond resort, boasting 1,621 luxurious guest rooms including the 600-room all-suite Tuscany Tower. Embark on a pampered journey at the remarkable three-story, 33,000-square-foot Spa & Salon Toscana featuring 24 treatment rooms, Northern Nevada's only Caldarium with indoor pool, sun deck, and full-service salon.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near Peppermill Resort?
faqs.answer: LakeRidge Golf Course, Wolf Run Golf Club, ArrowCreek Country Club, and Somersett Golf & Country Club are all within 15-20 minutes.

faqs.question: Does Golf the High Sierra offer packages with Peppermill?
faqs.answer: Yes — custom stay-and-play packages include lodging at Peppermill, tee times, carts, and full concierge planning. Call 888-584-8232.

faqs.question: What's the best room type for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Deluxe Two Queens or Deluxe Remodeled Double Queens are great for buddies trips. For a special trip, upgrade to Spa Suites or Grand Suites with in-room jetted tubs.

faqs.question: Is parking free at Peppermill?
faqs.answer: Yes — both valet and self-parking are free, with EV charging stations available on-site.
